user_query: I'm thinking of organizing a beach party this weekend. Can you fetch the current air quality index and the 3-day air quality forecast for the beach location? The latitude is 33.6846 and the longitude is -118.1639. Additionally, I would like to know if there are any severe weather alerts in the area.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current air quality index for the beach location using the provided latitude and longitude.
Fetch the 3-day air quality forecast for the beach location.
TaskList.dependency: Step 1 needs to be completed before this step.

TaskList.description: Check for any severe weather alerts in the area.
